page.title: 13TRADE -SHOPS
page.content: NEARLY ALL THE MAJOR RETAILERS HAVE AN OUTLET IN BASILDON. THEY INCLUDE MARKS AND SPENCER,BOOTS,W H SMITH,C & A,SAINSBURYS,DIXONS,ETC. IN ADDITION THERE ARE TWO HUGE DEPARTMENT STORES - ARMY AND NAVY AND ALLDERS. THERE IS ALSO A COVEREDD MARKET AND A THRIVING OPEN-AIR MARKET WHICH HAS A WIDE RANGE OF STALLS. WITH GOOD CAR-PARKING, BUS AND RAIL STATIONS IN THE TOWN CENTRE THESE SHOPS NOT ONLY SERVE THE RESIDENTS BUT ALSO HELP TO MAKE BASILDON AN ATTRACTION TO SHOPPERS FROM AFAR, AND CREATES LOCAL EMPLOYMENT.
